definition: to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: I said at a meeting held in Dazhai that a failing agriculture would be an obstruction to industrial development.
sentences.chinese: 我在大寨会上说，农业搞不好就要拖工业的后腿。

sentences.english: No one would like a girl who does not maintain personal hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 谁会喜欢连个人卫生都搞不好的女人呢？

sentences.english: Typhoid fever sneaks in when sanitation fails.
sentences.chinese: 环境卫生搞不好，伤寒就会乘虚而入。

sentences.english: He would probably have been starved to death before he has learned the fishing skill.
sentences.chinese: 在他学会钓鱼之前搞不好他已经饿死了。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, occasionally you get a really smart teenager building one.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，搞不好你可以建个袖珍型的。

definition: more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
when the moment comes/at that time
